It is mandatory for students residing in the hostel to eat in the hostel mess. For safety and health reasons, bringing or ordering food from outside (tiffin) is strictly prohibited.
It is mandatory to deposit the mess fee to the concerned mess manager by the 5th of every month.
Even during holidays such as the end of the academic session (summer vacation), Holi, Diwali (one week), and winter vacation (semester break) except for 15 days, the mess payment must still be made.
In girl's hostels, the presence of a female mess manager is mandatory.
